scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker leverages carefully crafted input requests to the model to infer protected attributes like income and age, violating customer privacy regulations.
initial_goal: Develop a system to identify customers at high risk of churning.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: Customer relationship management (CRM) system for a large retail bank. The churn prediction model is used to prioritize customer retention efforts.
